item.content:encoded:
天才援交少女:
同志们，你们应该多看看新闻，比如《真理报》

https://www.newyorker.com/culture/culture-desk/the-post-truth-publication-where-chinese-students-in-america-get-their-news
有种日人民报怒喷大j院的感觉
